en_text: For 1 turn, increase ATK by 15% for each [Enhanced Wood Orbs, Enhanced Light Orbs] awakening skill on the team

jp_skill.name: スプライトサークル
jp_skill.raw_description: 1ターンの間、チーム内の木と光ドロップ強化の 覚醒数に応じて攻撃力が上昇。

kr_skill.name: 스프라이트 서클
kr_skill.raw_description: 1턴 동안 팀 내의 나무와 빛드롭 강화의 각성수에 따라 공격력이 상승

na_skill.name: Sprite Circle
na_skill.raw_description: ATK increases with the number of [Enhanced Wood, Light Orbs] Awoken Skills in team for 1 turn
